attributes.action: Update the NHS Long Term Plan for post pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
This includes Staff hiring & retention - pay increases, reintroducing bursaries, bringing down waiting lists and clearing the backlog - maybe routine scans etc can be done on night shifts to help bring those down - just like some places were open 24 hours for covid vaccinations etc, and night staff can be hired to continue doing admin

As well as sorting Ambulance times and Social care
attributes.background: This is asking for a government enquiry into the future of the NHS by asking what it needs to continue being the world leading Public Health Service we all love

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear if you want the Government to launch a Public Inquiry into the future of the NHS, or take specific actions now.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
